content.detailedDescription: I could not sleep so i was looking out my window for deer whe a star cought my eye because it just seemed to be shapped odd. i then get my binoculars and thats when i knew it wasn't a star. the object was oblong with red, white & blue lights the colors of the lights were very bold i have never seen blue or red lights this intense. i watched it for a few minutes and it moved ever so slightly and then stopped and just stayed there. i went into our bedroom and woke my husband i think it was about 2:30 am. i told him i think there is a ufo out back he got up and he used the binoculars and saw the same thing. (i don't want to speak for him so i am only telling my story). after about 15 minutes we finally went to bed but it was still there.  the reason i did not get a picture was because i only have a point & shoot camera that works and it was to far to show up. since that night we keep looking to the sky.
content.summary: We watched with binoculars for at least 15 minutes it was blinking red white and blue and was star like.

content.detailedDescription: At 6pm we observed 4 bright (burnt) orange colored lights, after we noticed them they went out shortly after the sighting. they were low on the horizon and about 3 miles aways to our east, there may have been more as we observed them thru trees. they seemed to be off set, not in a straight line? my wife spotted them first and was pointing trying to get my daughters attention and then me i caught the last 10 seconds of the sighting.We were all sitting out side on the patio,they were real bright and have never seen anything like it in the 10 years at this address. it was cold and clear skys. we smoke outside and all 4 of us were talking when my wife said what is that pointing to the east after getting my daughters attention sitting next to me i then turned to see the lights wink out, the were very unusal bright. i was going to get in my car and drive to the area but ive had surgery so i walked to the front yard to see if it had moved or reappeared in another location. light did not reappear.
content.summary: 4 orange/burnt orange colored lights.

content.detailedDescription:
We were upstairs and my son was doing his homework and i was helping him.
we have big windows and only half is covered by a shade. the top half of the window is uncovered. he looked up and yelled, ufo!!  we both started to look out the window and then called my friend who has seen it before and has been looking for it again.  as we looked we realized that there was more than one. there were three at first and then two more came and then two more came, there was up to seven but always two.  
they kept on flying in a large circle, they stayed around for a long time. some breaking off and going thier own way, but always two flying in a circle for the enitre time.
my son took pictures of them. one of pictures came out well. the others just look like lights in the sky.
there were three large lights and then blinking lights, red and blue on the sides.
seemed to be two different types, one looked like a boomerang and the other more of an octagon.
my son and friend went outside to look at them, there was no sound.
it seemed as though they would stop and hover for less than a minute and then start to move again.
i fell asleep before before they were gone, my friend went back downstairs and my son stayed up taking pictures of them and i am not sure what time he finally went to sleep but they were still there.
they were not there this morning that we saw.

i cannot attach the picture, it is on his phone and he doesnt know how to forward it to email. i will try to do that later when we are home.
content.summary: Up to seven at one time out the window of our home. my friend, myself and son saw them.

content.detailedDescription:
My son and i watched it for a half hour and took photos but they weren't the greatest but as we had them developed we noticed that there were 2 flying saucers instead of the one that we were looking at.
if you need to know more than contact us at {pid}
my son was on the computer and decided to take a break and as he looked out the window of our 2 story townhouse he yelled at me saying there was a ufo so i got up hoping he wasnt lying ,,,, cus i was sleeping at about 11:00 am and i looked out the window only to see a circular shaped flying saucer the color of a rustic brownish red fence the shape of an innertube with a black basketball in the middle all flat colored. not shiny. and no lights. just hovering in the sky not making any sound and not moving. for about 15 minutes. then i told my son to get the camera , but by the time we got it it was out of good range. but we caught 2 objects instead of just 1. and we didnt even know it till the film was developed. but i will go to my grave knowing that they do exist no matter what our government wants us to realize.
and so will my son. but even moreso when i lived in sandiego about 20 years ago i saw a triangular ship with no lights about a quarter mile in size flying and hovering over san diego at about 1:00 in the morning. and before thqat i saw a blinking light at the age of 31 in the high desert going from star to star in the blink of an eye in the high desert of san diego and that was 24 years ago. i'm an optician with an associates degree not that that matters but i know that alien life does exist. and our govmts r to proud to admit that they might not be able to control there own destiny's


{cms/jat/pid} text moved to narrative
content.summary: Brownish red innertube shape with black ball in middle flat colors no lights.

content.detailedDescription: I paul got in pool floating on my back torches were lit around pool area that blocked my view in direction of objects.Patricia aprox 5min latter came out and reclined in lounge chiar just outside of torches and began pionting at the northeastern sky saying look look what are those birds . she said paul those arent birds look quick.In a hurry i estinguished the torch preventing my view of same  area .When i witnessed 5 objects backing away at an angle of accent that would have kept them behind the light of the torch had it still been lit at that very moment they were aprox 1000ft high made an acute angle turn toward the southeast while simalltaniusly leveling altitude four of the ojects flew in a diomond formation while one separate darted around as if to scurry in the sky  the lone oject shot past the other four at aspeed so fast it seemed to disapeer into a paralell diminsion in a milli second the four in formation did the same.There was never any sound at all none.Patricia witnessed them at an altitude of 100ft in full view an drew a scetch of the objects i believe she had a close encounter as well as my self for even a longer period of time only i myself was not privi to it until she brought the objects to my attention. i think i had been oseverved for a while pryor to being informed we did report this sighting on an internet ufo site that i dont remember the name of.We were certain bacause of the speed and agillity of these objects combined with thier abillity to hover without sound that they were not man made .
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: At night 100ft over our yard were 5 craft glowing in center hovering they were aprox 15 to 20 ft. tip to tip that observed us and flew away very fast.

content.detailedDescription: I have several videos of objects that first appear as stars, but when i look closely they blink. i got out my camera with a 35x optical 800x digital. these objects are changing colors from yellow,blue,red,orange, etc. they are moving upwards. they will be bright one minute and lose color the next. there are several at a time. some look like balls changing colors. i have filmed them for several nights now. tonight i again found them and it was bright red orange but in a horseshoe shape. i have video of all the sightings. sometimes if i am filming one, while im watching, another one will pass by. i have video of these colorfull things moving quickly and i strugglt to keep them in my view. others seem to float or glide. i have no reason to believe they will not be out there tommorow. i will continue to watch and video.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Video of horseshoe shaped object pulsating changing colors and moving.

content.detailedDescription:
This isn't a joke and i have lived with it for a very long time. since the time i saw this craft i have learned so much about . . . evrything that it almost relegates my sighting to nothing. however  - it is my greatest desire to be hypnotisised and have someone get all of the  . . .Info  . . .Out of my head. i am tired of what i have seen and what i have since learned. 

as far as the sighting. you will find many other peopl have had the same sighting as myself. it was nearly or more than a decade ago. 

i was heading west on lower roswell rd away from azalea it was after timber ridge road and up a hill i passed the affluent neighborhood of  - oh heck - i can't remember it now. it has all sorts of nice homes. after lower roswell rises from the river it makes a sharp turn to the left,  it then turns sharply to the right. kind of like a long angle iron. 

i was on a pizza delivery and came up lower roswell rd and turned left with the rd i could see that,very far ahead of me above the trees in the distance, where the rd turned left that there was a triangular black craft hovering above the trees where the rd turned west again. 
i have to say that i was shocked but i had a job to do. i kept heading toward it. this turn shoulod be easy to find on a map it's one large z.

when i was nearly under it - you want to know what the lihgt arrangement was. okay i was so scared that all i recall remember was that there was one very bright light at each one of the 3 corners. i do seem to rememmber that there was an accumulation of lights at the center but i t honestly say that the one in the center was red but i have this feeling that it was. 

i was headed straight for this object and then of course the road changed and i turned to the right -  and so i made a right turn  - at this point the stationary aircraft moved along side of my car and kept pace with me until we approached the nearby lights and then it veered south or left. 

i have seen this same aircraft twice since then and other sightings. i am an accountant and not a crackpot. but i want others to have my knowledge as it has felt as a weight on my soul.
content.summary: Triangle.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i was talking on the phone while she drove home from work. a few minutes before 7 pm my wife told me she see something in the sky.  she sees three very bright lights in the sky.   she was on the main street leading to our house, which is also higest point in town.  she tells me to hurry out side  and see if i can get a glimps at  the lights.
she says that there are 3 huge white lights in the sky .She lost sight of them when she made the corner of our road.  when she made it to the house she asked me if i had seen anything, and i replied no.  so we procrastinated for a while looking into the sky.  out of the east i see a plane, i thought at the time.  out of the north i see another plane, commercial liner.  we was focused on the commercial plane when we notice the first obtect wasnt a plane.  while approaching it looked a plane with the landing light on there for we didnt think anything of it.  when it got completely over head we could see that there was a triangle formation of red lights.  1, 2, 3 of them.  the flew right over the commercial plane. the 3 objects was  giving off some much lighe around them that we could actually see the air plane and its vapor trail. it was like daylight when they passed over the plane.  the flew in a straight line at a rate a bit slower than the plane. we tried to follow it to get pics but was unable... camcorders sux at night.  so we lost sight of them.  we looked for awhile then gave up.  we got back to the house and as soon as we got out of the car we spotted 3 more red triangles of lights.  this time they were in  a triangle pattern.  they where coming from the southeast, and appeared to be heading to the direction the first group went.  it was about 7:30 pm then.  we take this seriouse because after the sighting  the jets started patroling the  skys. there is an airforce base about and hr and a half from here. and we always notice the jets are coming from that  directions.   the base is barksdale in shreveport la. and im sure the commerial plane is out of  the airport there.  so if anyone wants to do some follow up.  im sure someone on the plane noticed lights outside illuminating the entire plane.
content.summary: 6 triangle shape objects.

content.detailedDescription: Around the end of july 2007, i was sitting in a chair on my back porch enjoying the warm weather under cloud cover which was at the normal height for low clouds, with a small breaks of blue sky scattered throughout the clouds. as i was looking at one of the small blue breaks in the clouds above me and slightly to the west, when suddenly i noticed a saucer craft going through the break in the clouds heading from the northeast heading southwest. the craft was cloud-white colored on the bottom with the top part that i could see silver with a purple-blue dome on top with streaks of gold on the back part of the dome. i saw the craft for about three seconds (or less). since i have realized that what i saw was a lot bigger than i thought at the time. the craft was thicker through the middle than the sides.
content.summary: Saucer vehicle went through a break in the clouds i was looking up at.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down riviera drive and i happen to randomly look up at the clear baby blue sky.  there were many birds flying around.  then i saw a very shinny silvery object that was not moving.  it looked like a giant gum drop from afar.  or rather a bell shape object.  i continued driving and then my view was blocked by a tree then i was able to see it again after i passed the tree and it moved quickly to the right and then out of no where, it disappeared.  there were no clouds or airplanes in the sky.  i was surprised at first.  i wasn't scared or worried.  i just accepted it.
content.summary: It was a bell shape.  very shinny and silver.

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo: large black triangle sighting

size: estimated size was 3-4 times larger than southwest airlines jet.
altitude: estimated 2,000 ft. to 3,000 ft. agl
duration: 30 seconds.
direction: vehicle was traveling east.
speed: 150 to 200 mph
date: feb. 04, 2009
time: 12:26 am
weather: clear skies, stars, and excellent unlimited visibility.
location: missouri city texas 77459 / just south of houston.
sighting: viewed with gen3 night vision scope.

description: it is important to note that the vehicle had 5 large ir lights on the right side of the wings. 2 lights located near the front of the leading edge, and 3 additional ir lights along the far edge of the right wing. these light were not visible to the naked eye, they were ir like military and very visible through the scope. as the vehicle flew over head the back round star field was blocked from view as it passed over.

location: latitude: n29 35.4897' / longitude: w95 34.5314'

large black vehicle flew over headed east at through hobby airport controlled air space without any typical visible marking or strobe light. normal heavy southwest airline air traffic was present at the time on final approach to hobby airport. sighting lasted about 30 seconds and was viewed with gen 3 night vision scope. vehicle speed estimated at 150+ mph no typical aircraft marking light or anti collision strobe light. the 5 ir lights on the right side were visible through the scope only.
content.summary: Black triangle fly over with 5 ir lights on the right side wings.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were traveling south from gallatin, tn. on hwy 109; we noticed a strange cloud or object to the southeast.  we thought it was a break in the clouds because it was overcast.  what was so unusual was that the phenomenon was shaped like an eye and the upper edge was a rainbow color.  it was pale blue in the center, but you could not see any clouds moveing behind it.  also, there were never any heavy clouds moving in front
either.  the only clouds that moved in front of this phenomenon were perpendicular and very thin.  it seemed that the pencil thin clouds were pulled form the overcast sky and moved over the eye area and than dispersed.  we watched this happen approximately seven times.  we were hoping that by contacting mufon your organization might help us understand what we saw.  just a note; as we were traveling on hwy 109, there was a car pulled over and a genterman was taking pictures. we took four pictures using our verizon camera phone.  i'm sending three with this report and the light at the top of the picture is glare from the windshield.  thanks for any information.................Mike
content.summary: Strange object or cloud in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Ottumwa , iowa 9:00 pm  2-3-09


my friend was on his way driving to pick me up . on his way he notices a bright light hovering above the high school football field. he picks me up and tells me to check out something  and we go over  the hill on iowa avenue  and   he says "look"  i see it right over what i can say is either the field itself or over the center of town.  it is a bright white light and sitting there , i think is this a helicopter  coming dead on at first. i roll down the window and no sound and so sign of red or blue lights ?  so we turn the corner and shortly after the thing begins to pulse and turns from white to  a amber color  with a white streak to the left  and is gone! we are looking in the same area and then look and see it way off to the south west of town but dimmer .    it is in the direction of the mall , now we begin to trip out !!! now this is where we are not sure it is the same thing or another craft . so we head towards its direction and this thing moves to the north west and then hovers over from what i can tell is the tree line and descends in a fielded area where mostly corn fields should be .  i have portions of this footage on my digital camera and him on his cell phone  during half the chase. unfortunately i did not record the footage from when we first saw this thing at it's brightest. i will say it was as intense as the moon but smaller hard to say what size it was. it clearly was not a conventional air craft , planet , and performed excessive speeds. 

this was not a chopper a plane or venus this was a moving object that traveled in 4 directions and changed color and defied what we know.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Pulsing white and amber sphere hovering and darting over town.

content.detailedDescription: I had just gotten off of work after midnight and was taking home a co-worker when looking out over the ocean we both noticed an unusual bright orange light several miles off the coast.  being curious, instead of going straight home we decided to see if we could get a better view of it by driving along san clemente, california up in the hills parallel to the coastline.  we noticed the light stayed constant and bright as we drove south parallel along the coast.  we finally stopped down by a beach parking lot where we had a clear view out to sea.  we could not understand what this object could be nor could we make out what this light was.  we asked ourselves what could be out there this late at night on the ocean waters, perhaps a fishing boat with bright lights?  do any boats go out this late with bright lights to fish for something?  if it was a boat fishing why would the light vary in intensity and with that particular color (orange)?  could it be a boat on fire?  the light was firelike in intensity and color as if it was on fire.  even though it was dark, i figured it must have been a few miles south of santa catalina island and a few miles west off san clemente.  we stayed there for several minutes watching this light glow and change in its shape.  at one point the light dimmed to a point and then returned to its large intensity.  we decided to leave and go home still puzzled.  we must have watched it for around 15 minutes from point of seeing it to end.
content.summary: Fire-shaped light out over pacific ocean near santa catalina island.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were driving home, eastbound interstate 20, from abilene, tx.  we had just passed clyde, tx and i noticed a light out of the passenger side window.  i looked up and saw a row of round, symmetrical orange lights (resembling the caution light in a traffic signal light).  at first there were approximately three lights then slowly, a couple more lights blinked on, then rapidly a couple more lights blinked on.  the aircraft was not really visible escept for a faint outline.  it appeared to be a large body that reminded me of the aircraft used by the military to take troops in and out of war zones when in battle(maybe called banana boats or something similar to that).  again, it was just an impression of that shape, not exactly because it was not clearly visible.  the object was moving quickly and it made the right edges of each circle look blurred as if it might be fire. the lights began to blink off slowly at first from the right end of the row, going left, then in rapid succession they all blinked off, just like they did when they were blinking on in the opposite direction from left to right.  the only thing visible after this was a blinking whitish light at what seemed to be the front of the aircraft.  i watched it for maybe a minute as it moved east and was no longer visible.  my husband was driving and he saw it at the same time i did, but he kept driving, just taking glances at it.  we wwere both amazed as we realized we were seeing something that we did not recognize as any aircraft lights we had seen before.  i told my family about it when we got home and we watched the 10:00 pm news and did not see any mention of it.  the abilene reporter news did not have anything about it either the next day.  however, when i got to work the next day, an associate made a statement to me saying that i would not believe what he saw last night.  i started to get excited when he said that he was outside at lake cisco in cisco, tx (approximately 25-30 miles from where we had seen the lights) around dusk when he saw some lights and that the craft looked like it  might have had fire coming from it.  we talked about the shapes,color, blinking and movement and it was apparent that we had seen the same thing.  the associate looked around the internet that day and could not find anyone else who had reported a similar sighting at that time.
content.summary: While traviling east on i-20 my husband and i saw a series of lights that blinked on then off and rapidly moved out of sight.

content.detailedDescription: My mother and i had just had a normal day, seeing relatives and shopping and such. when it was time to go home we decided to take a quiet stretch of road near all the orchards. it was just a little past dinnertime. (around 6:30) at first i noticed nothing. but my mother said- " those can't be the water tower lights." that's when i noticed them. i thought they could be some kind of normal airplane doing a scout of the sky, being just ten days before the inauguration. where we were going we had to drive right under where it was then. driving closer we saw through the trees it was in the same exact spot, and it wasn't just one, but three! all three in a v-like formation, the one at the top had five lights, one just a bit lower and to the right had three, and the one to the lower left had two! all different aircraft! we stopped in a convienience store parking lot to just watch these things. they hovered there for a while. when we saw two normal easily identified airplanes fly past, we knew these things were mysteries.  my mother and i were just amused watching these things. slowly the things started moving forward, slow as a blimp would, (but we knew it wasn't a blimp because we could see the strange outline.) and we decided to just leave.
content.summary: Driving home at night and saw three boomerangs in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
At 7 pm i looked out my window to see if any repair crews were outside to repair a downed power line.
no crews were there, but i noticed a very large object in the southern sky traveling from east to west.
i went outside to try and get a better look.
it was very slow and flying very low (500' - 1000').
i thought it might be a blimp, but it had no markings as most blimps do.
the shape appeared to be like an over inflated football.
the bottom half appeared to be illuminated with a white light.
there was a small solid green marker light at each end, and a flashing red light at the top center.
there were other aircraft visible at the same time. i could see what appeared to be a helicopter traveling west and south of it. another helicopter traveling west and north of it.
it was later trailed by a prop driven plane.
if it was a blimp, then why didn't it have a gondola?
if it was extraterrestrial, then why did it have the marker lights?
i watched it for about 15 minutes until it traveled west and out of site behind a tree line.
it appeared to be traveling parallel and just north of the interstate 10 freeway in fontana, ca.
after losing site of the object, i came back into the house and looked on the internet trying to find a description of where marker lights are supposed to be located on blimps. no luck finding any description there.
this object was very visible, and should have been seen by many people.
i just want to know what it was, and if anyone else had seen it on february 3, 2009.
content.summary: It was not like any other blimp that i have ever seen.

content.detailedDescription:
I turn my camera to black and white and shot a few times. i didn���t see a thing, but when i looked to the lcd display i saw this object.
it was invisible to the naked eye and it was really fast.
content.summary: Ufo over buenos aires.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from my brother's house when i first observed a single, very intense white light 20 degrees above the western horizon (observation point littleton colorado).  the object was directly west, and appeared to be over the pine junction/bailey area in the mountains.  i kept in sight as i drove home and stood next to my car after i parked it.  the entire time it was under direct observation (approximately fifteen minutes), it did not move at all.

i first thought it was an aircraft or helicopter.  however, the object absolutely did not move, not even the tiniest flucutation in position.  i was using the mountains below as well as a tree to keep track of its position.

it was larger than any star or planet (probably double the size of the largest star in the sky), and because it did not move even a hair during the period observed, it was not a helicopter or an aircraft.  it was a circular light source of brilliant intensity that never shifted or fluctuated.

the light was brilliant, almost a "pure" white light, and the intensity was so strong there is no way it was a reflected light; it came from an artificial source and never changed in intensity or in color or position.

i first noted the object because i tend to look at the passing aircraft a lot, and there was moderate air traffic in the area during the sighting.  what brought it to my scrutiny is that the light (object) never moved.

i went inside to find a telephone number to make a report once i determined that this object was unidentified per my forty years of intense aviation interest.  i first left a voicemail message with the noise complaint hotline at buckley afb in denver, then called the command center of the 140th wing of the air national guard at the same base.  the female sergeant who took the call was very polite and asked very detailed questions regarding the sighting, then placed me on hold while she spoke with "her boss".  she was back on the line in about two minutes and said that her boss had the object under observation, and that mine was the first call they had received about it, and i jokingly responded that "well, i'm sure that someone in the command structure is already aware of it."  knowing that us air force personnel had the object under observation, i retired for the evening.

during the entire fifteen minute observation period, i used the mountains and the branches of a tree (there was no wind) to ensure that it did not change position.  the intensity of the light never fluctuated, and the object never once moved, not even slightly.

my feelings and reactions were first disbelief, trying to classify it as an approaching aircraft or a hovering helicopter, but as the object never moved, i realized that it was something that needed to be reported officially.  my reaction was rather clinical and analytical, trying my best to find any way to identify what i was seeing.

this was, in now way whatsoever, an aircraft or a helicopter, and in no way was the intense white light a reflection off a shiny surface (the object would have been far too low to catch sunlight as the sunset here is about two hours earlier than my sighting).

thank you for taking the time to read my report.  i cannot classify this sighting as anything but unidentified.
content.summary: Stationary object directly observed for 15 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: Me my son and my neighbor and his nephew were in my neighbor's backyard viewing the stars towards the south. my neighbors nephew saw it first, it came right over the trees with no noise.It was about 1200 to 1500 feet across. it had bright white lights at each tip of the triangle and had five rectangular white lights that were going from left to right in a strobe fashion. there was also green and red lights at each point around the five rectangualr strobes. you could tell it was solid because you could not see any stars through it. the craft was going very slowly right over our houses. i had my digitial camera the the time, i set it to take video but the camera would not turn on. i also had just put in brand new batteries in the camera. we all knew right away that this was not a craft from our earth. we were all dumbfounded and excited and scared at the same time. there was no noise at all it just cruised real slow over our houses and kept going to the north. afetr we lost sight of the object my camera began to work perfectly? we watched it until it no longer was visible. after the sighting we stood outside trying to think of what it could of possibly been. we quickly came to the same thought that this was a ufo sighting and deffiantly not anything a human is capable of making or will ever be able to make in the near future.
content.summary: Perfect triangle shape 1500 feet across 5 rectangular white strobe lights in middle of craft white lights at all three tips with green and red lights near the strobe lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I was exiting my house at approximately 9:00-9:15pm.  i looked into the western to northwestern sky and noticed a very bright, orange and reddish in color object.  it just seem to be suspended there in the sky.  at first i just passed it off as a planet and went back inside.  about 1 minute later i came back out to get into my vehicle and noticed it was still there.

i began driving to my girlfriends house, just so happened to be in the same direction as the object.  while i was in route to my girlfriends residence i began to observe the object more closely.  i then became aware that there was no way it was a planet or a star.  it was to big. for example if u held a dime or penny out arms length and looked at it in the sky thats about how big it was.  it was also way to bright.  i also do dabble in astronomy and know my stars, planets and constellations well.  ive also been in law enforcement for 7 years or more.  i have been trained to observe things and situations.

as i kept observing the object for the next 5 minutes or so.  it then shrank and then totally vanished.  approximately 3 to 5 seconds later it reappeared a lot farther away in the same direction.  i seen it do this 2 more times in about 5 more minutes before i lost sight of it.  it had to have been traveling at incredible speed to blink out and then reappear that far away.  i was amazed by this!!!

ive have seen a similar object about 3 to 4 years before.  when i was working for a sheriffs department we were receiving phone calls about strange objects in the sky.  me and another officer went to check it out.  

when we were in route to a certain town i observed 4 very bright, orange reddish objects suspended over the town. they were in a perfect line, perfectly spaced.  while we were driving we lost sight of the town and the objects.  when the town came back into view the objects were gone.
content.summary: Very bright, orange red in color.

content.detailedDescription:
I was coming out of the civic center library in scottsdale, about to walk home, when i saw a star-like object, but too large to be a star, hanging in the sky to the west.  it did not appear to be moving like the planes that were flickering red all around it (we���re near sky harbor airport).  i headed south walking down drinkwater blvd toward osborn.  the object was on my right, due west, the whole time.  at various times i would stop to get a better look at it or try to figure out its size or location in the sky relative to a landmark.  it was lower than telephone lines and trees lining the street.  i continued past osborn, and then turned onto 74th street toward earll.  the object was still there and had not moved at all that i could tell; it stayed directly to my right until i turned east onto earll.  

i kept turning around to look at the object even though it was now behind me.  i saw a woman walking her dog partway down earll and asked her if she saw what i was looking at and what she thought it was.  she said she had thought it was a star, but i pointed out that it was rather large and too low.  i also told her i saw dark green and red in the middle of the white rays coming off it.  she said it was also blinking.  i think she meant the whole thing was flickering in a star-like way; the red and green parts did not appear to be blinking at all to me.  the woman said she thought it must be a light on the top of a tower, but i didn���t see anything it could be attached to.  i told her if that were the case it (the light) would still be there tomorrow.  i told her i thought it was following me home.  she joked with me that a beam might come out of it at, and then we parted.  

i continued down miller, turning south and crossed thomas, still keeping an eye on it.  walking down past the residential streets coming off of miller, i could see that the object came below street lights and barely skimmed over the tops of the one-level houses there.  i stopped across the street from an alley where i could see that the light was on a level with the top t of the second telephone pole going down the alleyway, which gave me an idea of its position in the sky.  if i stepped slightly to the side, it vanished behind the pole, which gave me an idea of its size.  i walked on about 20 feet, but then turned back to my point in front of the alley.  that was when i noticed that the object was now slightly lower in the sky because it wasn���t being ���framed��� in the same way by the second telephone pole as it had been before.  if it were a light on a tower, it would not have the ability to move up and down on a vertical plane.  

at coronado high school, the light was lower than the highest parts of the school, but higher than the lower rooftops.  i then turned east at the boys and girls club on murray lane to head for home.  at that point, it was around 9:20 or just after and i was unable to keep track of it.  i will follow up tomorrow and walk the same route around the same time to see if i see it again.  if i do, it���s part of a tower or something; if i don���t, it���s unexplained.  i will update mufon then.  unfortunately, i do not have a camera phone and so i wasn���t able to get a picture of it.
content.summary: Saw a star-like object, too large and too low to be a star, hanging in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Was taking the dogs out and notice a bright star like object close to the horison and not sure if cloud cover caused it but it seemed to change in shape staying round and dimming it was all most himnotizing.
content.summary: Unusually bright light close to northern horizon.

content.detailedDescription: On a clear , crisp night my brother and i drove to pittsburg north on i-79 from wv. it was a trip we had made many times. we had just gone a few miles in pa. when i noticed a very bright light low on the left horizon. i studied it and i had my brother look carefully at it . he thought it was a plane and i had the erie feeling it was a ufo. the twists and turns in the road made us lose sight of it and then we could see it again...I said again to my brother it was a ufo and he rejected the idea...Suddenly as i looked to the left a streak of light shot by..I said "did you see that?" he replied "yeah"... we drove on and we could see the light low on the horizon agin..Then we went around another curve and lost sight of it...I was getting excited and suddenly on the left (south bound) side of the interstate i could see a very bright light hovering over the road, about a hundred feet up and cars were passing beneath it ...I yelled to my brother to look at it and i took the wheel of the car as he studied it...We fixed on that as we continued down the road at about 60mph...At abot the 18 mile marker we entered a long straightaway....Odd for this trip....And on the left , low on the horizon i could see the bright light we had first started watching... it was slowly travelling perpendicular to us and i realized we were going to meet this light farther up the highway... i told my brother to drive faster to intersect it...Slowly it approached...And quickly we sped to meet it..Excitement filled the air, and as we got close to it we could make out 2 headlights and a red and a blue light on each side.. it was almost on top of us now and i told my brother to pull off the road...! we did and the ship came over top of us and suddenly stopped! oh [cms/tg/pid]!!! i rolled down the window and stuck my head outside the car...My brother looked at it from the drivers seat.. i said to him.."it's tiangle shaped!" he replied it was a triangle with its corners cut off and this in indeed what i had seen but i was not trying to be specific as he was..I yelled to him to listen for a sound..There was only a soft humming noise....I said to call out details ...We could see a main fuselage.. a silvery gray color...No markings... a line crossing the back section horizontally..We tried to communicate telepathically with it...Crazy huh?...But it was indeed a crazy situation...Then suddenly it slowly turned on its axis and presented me with a view of a tail section that was lit up..My brother later told me he had not seen this tail section as he was still in the car and i had a better view....It stayed like this for a while...Time seemed to be irrelevant...And then it slowly went back from the direction it had come...Slowly...Maybe 15mph...I slipped back into the car and my brother was inshock...I said" man i can't believe we saw a ufo!" he replied over and over , shacking his head in disbelief..."no, no,no, no" " oh man"...We sat in the car and just shook as if frozen, shaking like a leaf.....We were stunned... we tried to contact the airport when we returned to pittsburg later but it was futile...A few days later i told some people about hte incident and a few days more went by when a girl i had told said she read about the sighting in a newspaper and that 30 other people had seen it that night....This is totally a true stry...I have told the story many times...And 30 years later i still get a rush from the thought of it and i can clearly see the whole thing in my head..
content.summary: A triangular ship came over the horizon and we stopped , it stopped and hoverd over our car.

content.detailedDescription: I was waiting for the bus and far out over the south-west end of town i saw three lights in the formation of a triangle. i thought nothing of it at first, assuming they were air traffic lights on a mountain, until the bottom light disappeared. soon one of the other lights began flickering on and off until eventually it disappeared as well. the final light disappeared but not soon after, they were all back, but they were further away this time. they left again and came back with an extra light. the extra light seemed to move around for a bit before disappearing. the lights seemed to be spreading apart very slowly near the end. i had to leave but i'm going back out soon, will report with more.
content.summary: Triangle of lights.

content.detailedDescription:
Starting on 1/20/09 my wife saw three very bright lights in the western sky over the mountain range in littleton next to denver.They stayed there 
from about 6:00pm till 8:15pm.The next day she only saw one light an that went on till she called from work on 1/24/0. i finally got off my butt, an got my camera out with a tri pod.I went outside about 7:00pm an started filming vids. unbeileavable! then on monday evenig went out agin an filmed, i got two of them. they are out every evening.They have not missed an evening yet. i just keep filming.Today is 2/03/09 they are also
out at 12:00 till about 2:30pm, but my wife is afraid to go out, an film,
she just watches..................Where are the satalites they can pick this up....
content.summary: Faraday cage holding vehical.

content.detailedDescription:
Hi, 
i am submitting this report on behalf of my wife. on 02/02/2009 approximately 10:00 pm pdt approximately 10 miles south of portland oregon my wife saw a small, red satellite size object moving southwest at what she described as to fast for a plane and too low to be a satellite. the object was then joined by a second object fitting the same description coming from the same direction as the first as if in an effort to catch the first one she saw. the second object then joined the first object and they both formed one large red object and then vanished from sight. my wife and myself are regular sky watcher's and take many trips outside the house every night to view the stars when the sky is clear. i/we know what stars are where at any given time and have a little knowledge of the movement of the stars and the position they hold in the sky at different times of the year. on this same night, 02/02/09 around 10:30 pm pdt as i viewed the sky i looked to the southwest and said to myself "well who are you ?" i was looking at what i thought was a star out of place and figured being winter in the northwest it was a star i had yet to see, i was wrong . after my wife informed me of what she saw i put two and two together and realized i had seen something that was not a star. it was not red or moving, more of a light blue and quite large. the object was east of orion from my location (beaverton oregon) at the same level as the three stars that make-up orion's belt. i began to search the internet this afternoon 02/03/09 to see if anyone else had seen the object/objects and bingo ! what follows is the original posting that i found..... craigslitst, portland oregon,... "ufo sighting no joke (gladstone)"......"i filmed a ufo from my back yard in gladstone the other night and it freaked me out, im a beleiver,i even filmed my dogs unusall behavior. everyone i have showed is freaked out by it and says i should try to sale it to national inquirerer or something. it changes shape and changes colors. its about 5 or more mins long. i think im just going to turn into fox 12 or channel 8 news but if you have any ideas on what i should do with it, let me know. my email". you can find the original post (above) at "craigslist", portland oregon, "rants and raves".
date: 2009-02-03, 3:04pm pst. i would like to share with you why my wife and myself watch the sky. six years ago my wife and myself were camping at clear lake just south of mt. hood oregon. it was around 2:00 pm pdt when i noticed an object that looked like the inside of an abalone shell that was stationary in the sky but pulsating as fluid moves, kind of like the outside of a soap bubble when the light is shinning just right on it. i turned my head away from the object to get my wife's attention, (i was around 25 yards from the shore, in the lake fishing) to show her the object, (my wife is laying on a blanket on the shore).Then, when i turned my head back in the direction of the object and pointed it out to her it came right down on top of me, within 100 feet or so as if to say hi or i/we see you also. i had the feeling it/they/them? knew i had spotted it/they/them? it was as if it/they/them? were making an effort to remove all question from my mind as to what i had seen or was seeing ?, or to acknowledge our meeting ? for some strange reason this is what i felt. i was as if it/they/them? had me "in the sights" per say. a strange kind of focus feeling came over me, it was as if the object and myself were on/in/at someplace else. it was about half the size of a school bus, and like i said, "fluid abalone" in nature. i have no idea how long it was above me, it was as if time stood still. the next thing i remember is everyone around the lake, more than 50 people erupting in a roar/cheer like you would hear at a football game after a touchdown. i had the feeling that no one around the lake really knew what we had just seen, as if a state of shock overcame everyone, nothing more than a animated "man did you see that" and a few people looking at me with a big smile and a very tight hug and a wow ! wow ! wow ! from my wife. i could sense a feeling of peace among the people/campers around the lake, as if we had all just been given something very special. i would like to add that a taste of some kind lingered in my mouth for a couple of days, as if the fillings in my teeth had been oxidized . i can still imagine/taste the taste when i talk about the experience. 

tom
content.summary: Viewed two red objects come together and then vanish.

content.detailedDescription:
i had just arrived home from work, and had just gotten out of my truck to go inside when i looked up in the sky, and saw a strange looking silver color disc shaped object moving across the sky making no noise of any kind. i am not sure how high in the sky the object was or how big it was due to it being in the sky directly above me with nothing to reference it to. it did seem to be very high in the sky though. 
 it was moving at what seemed to be the same speed that a normal jet liner would travel with the exception that is seemed to be moving forward and then it would leap or jerk ahead.  then it would resume it's normal pace and repeat this leaping, jurking maneuver several times. i observed this object for about 30 seconds and then it just disappeared while it was heading in a north west direction. 
 we have aircraft traveling over head all the time making their final approach to sky harbor airport in phoenix, so i'm very familiar with all the different types of jet aircraft that are in the skies over mesa, arizona. i also was in the us navy for several years and i was stationed  aboard an aircraft carrier, so i am very familiar with military jet aircraft as well. it really made me stop and wonder what it was that i was looking at, and one thing i know for sure, it was not an aircraft that i've ever seen before. 
 i don't know if this is of any significance or not, but i felt that i needed to report the sighting. 
                                thanks for you time, martin fernandez
content.summary: I saw a disc shaped opject moving from the south east ,to the north west.
Viewed 1-4 dark objects emitting no light nor sound for about 6 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: I went out back to smoke a cigarette and sat in my patio chair, it was an extremely clear night and i was looking at all the stars and activity in the sky.  one star, i presumed was a star; was awful strange looking to me, like it had appendatures with lights running up and down it.  i thought to myself this must be the space station or something like that.  i was joking around and talking to it and asking it to move and it did.  from my point of view in relation to the sky looked like it moved about one inch.  i'm sure i seen some kinda pulses come off of it several times....Maybe orbs.  anyhow, i went back inside and watched a movie pretty much dismissing it.  a couple  a hours later i came back out and it was still up there, flashing different colors up and down its spines. i went out and looked at it several more times the last time being about three am. i wanted to go to the shop and get my telescope and probably should have; i just kept thinking ...This is the skylab or a sattelite or something or if i go to get me telescope it will probably disappear. the last time i looked at at three in the morning it had moved to the western part of the sky, as i'm facing south it put it right in between my tree branches; it got really vibrant, the light's were really strobing out.  i enjoyed watching it and laughed a little..Figured if i was seeing it so were other people.  i don't know what it was for sure but the one time it moved that's for sure..It was a definite movement the rest of the time it seemed like it just floated along.  i went to bed. i will watch for it again tonight.
content.summary: Flashing strobing very passive and slow moving strange articulations.
